spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is correct. The bedroom door orientation is mirrored (swings into the living area instead of bedroom). The main entrance door is missing a physical leaf and frame, represented only by a floor arc. Balcony access door is misinterpreted as a full wall opening.

structural_fidelity.notes: The utility room partition wall is missing, merging it into the kitchen space. The toilet/bath wall layout is simplified, losing the specific niches shown in the 2D plan. Wall thickness is consistent but the structural pillar near the balcony is omitted.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of the dining table, sofa, and kitchen appliances. The bedside tables are hallucinated/added as they were not in the 2D plan, but they serve the scale well.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality rendering with soft shadows and clean geometry. The orthographic/isometric perspective is well-maintained. Lighting is consistent.

detected_errors.description: Missing partition wall between Kitchen and Utility room.
Bedroom door swing orientation is incorrect (E3); it swings out into the living room.
Toilet fixtures (sink and commode) are swapped relative to the entry door.
Hallucinated bedside tables and modified headboard design not present in the 2D original.
The foyer area is slightly wider than the plan, distorting the entry sequence.
